religion: Joined by the henotheistic solar cult of Sol Invictus (Before 380 CE)
leader6: Theodosius I The final emperor to rule over all of the Empire's territories before its conversion to a diarchy.
leader7: Julius Nepos Officially the final emperor of the Western empire.
leader11: Constantine VI Final ruler to be universally recognized as Roman emperor, including by the surviving empire in the East, the Papacy, and by kingdoms in Western Europe.
